plugin-data.name: Contact3
plugin-data.description: Add a contact form to Bludit, with the ability to use a custom template.

the-list-is-based-only-on-published-cont: The list is based only on published content. The contact form will be positioned below it.
your-email-tip: This is the address you want the email to be sent TO.
please-enter-a-valid-email-address: Please enter a valid email address
please-enter-the-content-of-your-message: Please enter the content of your message
thank-you-for-contact: Thank you for contacting me. I will reply you as soon as possible.
an-error-occurred-while-sending: Sorry, for some reason the mail server did not accept the mail for sending. Please try again later.
smtp-options: Please fill in the following values if you want to send messages by a smtp account.
anti-spam-info:
Enables Google reCAPTCHA v2 in contact form.
Before activation, you need to register your website at Google reCaptcha.
Choose Version 2. Both the Site Key and Secret Key are required.
please-check-that-you-are-not-a-robot: Please activate the checkbox "I'm not a robot".
send-from-which-address-tip: If you can, send from the user, but some hosts insist on a known domain email. Otherwise, you may prefer to send the email FROM your address.
send-from-to: Send email from the TO address (above)
send-from-domain: Send email from the Domain address (below)
domain-email-tip: This would be an active mailbox on your domain. Some hosts only allow email from a known address.
